activityPreview.description: Using this type of activity, you can share information about books, articles, newsletters, videos, podcasts, demos, or projects you have created.
activityPreview.title: Content creation

jsonSchema: {"type":"object","additionalProperties":false,"properties":{"contentType":{"enum":["Articles","Books","Console Projects","Demos","Newsletters","Podcasts","Reusable GCP presentations","Videos"],"type":"string","errorMessage":"This field is required."},"title":{"minLength":3,"maxLength":200,"type":"string","errorMessage":"This field is required and can be between 3 and 200 characters."},"description":{"maxLength":20000,"type":"string","errorMessage":"This field is required and can be at most 20000 characters."},"description_plain_text":{"maxLength":2000,"type":"string","errorMessage":"This field is required and can be at most 2000 characters."},"tags":{"minItems":0,"unsupportedValuesErrorMessage":"This field cannot contain inactive tags","type":"array","uniqueItems":true,"items":{"type":"string","enum":["{{ACTIVITY_TAGS_PLACEHOLDER}}"]},"errorMessage":"At least 0 elements are required."},"metrics":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":false,"properties":{"readers":{"minimum":1,"type":"integer","errorMessage":"This field is required and should be minimum 1 characters."}},"required":["readers"]},"activityDate":{"format":"date","type":"string","errorMessage":"This field is required."},"activityUrl":{"pattern":"^https?:\\/\\/(www\\.)?.*$","maxLength":500,"type":"string","errorMessage":"Required valid URL."},"imageUrl":{"maxLength":500,"type":"string"},"additionalInfo":{"maxLength":20000,"type":"string","errorMessage":"This field can be at most 20000 characters."},"additionalInfo_plain_text":{"maxLength":2000,"type":"string","errorMessage":"This field can be at most 2000 characters."},"private":{"type":"boolean","errorMessage":"This field is required."}},"required":["contentType","title","description","description_plain_text","metrics","activityDate","activityUrl","private"]}
jsonFormUiSchema: {"type":"Categorization","elements":[{"label":"Content details","type":"Category","elements":[{"label":"Content details","type":"Group","elements":[{"scope":"#/properties/contentType","label":"Content type","type":"Control"},{"scope":"#/properties/title","label":"What was the title?","type":"Control"},{"scope":"#/properties/description","label":"What was it about?","options":{"wysiwyg":true,"withStringValidation":true,"toolbar":[["bold","italic","underline","strike"],["link"],[{"list":"ordered"},{"list":"bullet"}]],"formats":["bold","italic","underline","strike","link","list"]},"type":"Control"},{"scope":"#/properties/tags","label":"Tags","options":{"format":"multiselect","dictionaryKey":"tags"},"type":"Control"},{"scope":"#/properties/metrics/properties/readers","label":"How many people read your content?","type":"Control"},{"scope":"#/properties/activityDate","label":"Date published","options":{"format":"date","showTime":false,"disablePastDates":false,"dateFormat":"yyyy-MM-dd","saveFormat":"yyyy-MM-dd"},"type":"Control"},{"scope":"#/properties/activityUrl","label":"Link to Content","placeholder":"https://","type":"Control"}]}]},{"label":"Additional information","type":"Category","elements":[{"label":"Additional information","type":"Group","elements":[{"scope":"#/properties/additionalInfo","label":"Additional information","options":{"wysiwyg":true,"withStringValidation":true,"toolbar":[["bold","italic","underline","strike"],["link"],[{"list":"ordered"},{"list":"bullet"}]],"formats":["bold","italic","underline","strike","link","list"]},"type":"Control"},{"scope":"#/properties/imageUrl","label":"Please provide an image for your activity","options":{"format":"image","uploadUrl":true,"deleteUrl":true,"hint":"You can upload JPG, PNG or GIF file","minImageWidth":300,"minImageHeight":300,"maxImageSizeMB":8,"allowedExtensions":["image/jpeg","image/png","image/gif"]},"type":"Control"},{"scope":"#/properties/private","label":"Do you want to make this activity private?","description":"This activity will only be visible to you and the community manager. No other member will have access to it.","options":{"toggle":true},"type":"Control"}]}]}],"options":{"variant":"stepper","showNavButtons":true}}

activityPreview.description: Using this type of activity, you can share your public speaking achievements. If you have spoken at a conference, hosted a webinar or similar – choose this type.
activityPreview.title: Public speaking
